# draw(in:)

**Instance Method**

Draws the view’s contents.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func draw(in view: MTKView)
```

## Parameters

- **view**: The view requesting that its contents be redrawn.

## Discussion

This method is called on the delegate when it is asked to render into the view.
title: draw(in:)
